name: Basic if block match
description: Matches IF-Blocks in basic. The Else and ElseIf blocks need to be reparsed.
content:
REM SAMPLE FILE

LET HWSTR AS STRING = "Hello World"
LET A AS INTEGER = 5

GOTO HELLO

PRINT "SHOULDN'T BE HERE!"

LBL HELLO:
CALL DEMO

REM NOT REALLY NECESSAIRY, BUT:
EXIT

SUB DEMO
  IF avb2 = "ab"
    PRINT HWSTR
  ELSE
    PRINT "LOOSER"
  END IF
END SUB
